Further talks on this will be on the board please.

> o.O 
> :: nods:: Nimoy was awesome as Galvatron. Notice that there are
other big names in the movie.. Judd Nelson as Hot Rod, Robert Stack as
Magnus, Lionel Stander as Kup, Eric Idle as Wreck Gar, Orson Wells as
Unicron. Such a host of oustanding names in Hollywood. 
> As to before the Qiunts, hard to say. However, the Quints were a
part of Unicron's minons. A lot of the episodes being released inform
alot of Transformer history now. "5 Faces of Darkness" is an excellent
on informing the time of when the Quints governed Cybertron to how the
Autobots & Decepticons came about & up to the present day. Awesome
info in that episode if you ask me.
